definition: to send away under escort (criminals, goods etc)
to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
surname Xie
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to transport under guard

sentences.english: Is there a deportee under your escort?
sentences.chinese: 請問你們警方是押解了一名遣返人員嗎？

sentences.english: ZuoYuKun tied on the carriage, ready to sent to the headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 左玉琨被綁上馬車，準備押解到司令部。

sentences.english: The criminal ran away during escort, because the men in charge of escorting breached their duty.
sentences.chinese: 在監押途中犯人逃跑了，這是押解人員的失職。

sentences.english: He was remanded to a mental hospital for assessment.
sentences.chinese: 他被轉移押解到精神病院接受進一步的檢查。
